meta_description: Discover world-class art in the heart of Phoenix. Explore our vast collection of 21,000+ objects, from ancient masterpieces to contemporary works. Engage in immersive exhibitions and educational programs for all ages. Visit Phoenix Art Museum today!
hours_text:
[Visit](https://phxart.org/visit/) __ Tickets

# We have so much to experience together.

To explore the art and experience events hosted by Phoenix Art Museum, reserve your ticket online for a seamless check-in.

Open Tomorrow: 10am - 8pm 

#### BECOME A PHXART MEMBER TO ENJOY UNLIMITED ADMISSION TO THE MUSEUM YOU LOVE, ALL YEAR LONG

[JOIN NOW](https://phxart.org/get-involved/membership/membership-levels/)

#### EVENT AND TICKET CALENDAR

Choose the date of your upcoming visit to view scheduled programs and discover all that Phoenix Art Museum has to offer. Select from the categories below to search by types of events.

##### PhxArt Member

Museum Members experience expedited check-in, free tickets to many events, exclusive access to exhibition openings and special experiences, discounts at the Museum Store and Palette Restaurant, and more.

##### First-Time Visitor

We welcome you to experience the wonder of Phoenix Art Museum with a fresh perspective. Explore our must-see collection highlights, special exhibitions, and enjoy all we have to offer.

##### Visiting with Kids

Make the most of your Phoenix Art Museum visit with guests of all ages – and for however you define family – with interactive, meaningful, and fun art experiences.

##### Quick Visit

Discover the essential Phoenix Art Museum experiences by exploring our must-see collection highlights, special exhibitions, and more.

###### Admission

###### Films

###### Performances

###### Workshops

###### Lectures ...

accessibility_text:
[Visit](https://phxart.org/visit/) __ Accessibility

# We are open for everyone.

Phoenix Art Museum makes every effort to ensure that our facilities and programs are as accessible as possible to guests of all abilities. Our policies are designed to ensure the safety of both our guests and our collection held in the public trust. We are committed to providing complete and satisfying experiences for our guests with disabilities.

#### BECOME A PHXART MEMBER TO ENJOY UNLIMITED ADMISSION TO THE MUSEUM YOU LOVE, ALL YEAR LONG

[JOIN NOW](https://phxart.org/get-involved/membership/membership-levels/)

#### Accessibility

For more information, questions, or concerns, or to request specific accommodations, please contact our guest services team at 602.257.1880 or [info@phxart.org](mailto:info@phxart.org).

We welcome comments and suggestions on ways in which we might improve the accessibility of Phoenix Art Museum. Please email, write, or call us at:

Phone:

602.257.4356

Email:

[education@phxart.org](mailto:education@phxart.org)

Mail:

Phoenix Art Museum  
Attn: Accessibility Manager  
1625 N. Central Avenue  
Phoenix, AZ 85004

Guests who are blind or have low vision

###### Large-Print and Rich-Text Format

Large-print labels for select exhibitions are available at the front desk in the Museum’s Greenbaum Lobby, and at select locations within the galleries. Large-print electronic format (rich-text format) labels for select exhibitions are available via email and may be request...
collections_text: Bring home a piece of Phoenix Art Museum with collectibles, books, and more from The Museum Store. Every purchase supports the Museum’s exhibitions and education programs.
